summary: CD Nord Ygritte Snow-Crowned Follower. Age and scars can be beautiful as well!
descriptionHtml:
CD Nord Ygritte Snow-Crowned Follower. Age and scars can be beautiful as well!


[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65163-1-1430165301.png[/img][/center]
[center][/center]
This is just simply a follower made from my newest character named Ygritte Snow-Crowned. Ygritte is an older nord lady who has aged well and survived more than a few battles. She has shown her prowess as a warrior and has the scars to prove it along with the wisdom that comes from old age. You will find her in the Bannered Mare. She is also marriageable. There is an Essential version and a Protected version. Choose the one you want. And please if you have any suggestions or constructive criticism please send it all my way.

Ygritte Snow-Crowned
Class: Combat Barbarian
One-Handed 24
Two-Handed 36
Archery 22
Block 27
Heavy Armor 15
Light Armor 31

I am working on a more tweaked version of Ygritte to reflect things like her being blind in one eye (i.e. low Archery skill) and not having any magical abilities (i.e. low magical skills).

If you want her face to look exactly like the screen shots you'll also need these mods :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3397/?]More Realistic Hair[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2356/?]Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3574/?]Gizmodians Scars[/url]

You can find the armor in the screens here :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52711/?]Dragonbone Barbarian Armor[/url]
*** If you want her to wear the armor you'll need to have the Dragonbone Barbarian Armor mod loaded and you'll need to give the armor to her. ***

I'd also recommend these follower mods :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]Extensible Follower Framework[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul[/url]

Permissions: You can do whatever you feel like with this mod, except make money.

My other mods :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57886/?]CD Female Dragonscale Ebonsteel Armor Fixes[/url] - Some fixes to the Female Ebonsteel Grand Helm and Boots
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63937/?]CD Nord Ygritte Snow-Crowned Racemenu Preset[/url] - Play as my newest character, Ygritte Snow-Crowned
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31129/?]CD Slower Werewolf Perk Points[/url] - Gain werewolf perk points at a slower rate
author: caldurham
